page.content: We measured temperature and rainfall each day between the dates shown. The Spring this year was late and unusually cold. {TEMPERATURE _}17 April to 23 May 1985 Highest 25c Lowest 8c Average 15c. {RAINFALL _}13 June to 17 July, daily. Most _ 80mm Average 12.3mm. No rain fell on 25 days during this period. {Children from the Junior class of {Hexton School}collected their information about the Hexton area from April to July 1985. The words which we recorded are but a fraction of the complete work which engendered much interest and enthusiasm. As Anne_Marie said,{"We {could write a page for every step of {the way".}The children were Mark, Heidi, Gregg, Anne_Marie, Debbie, Eleanor, Alexander, Hannah, Ellinor, Annabel, Jennifer, Karen & Toni_Marie.
